categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Tetsu was a male Sith Lord of the Sith Empire living during the Galactic War
Lord Tetsu was at the Imperial base camp during the Battle of Ilum and recruited allies to ensure that the Western Jedi ruins stayed in Imperial control.
Tetsu first appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011.
He is only accessible to Imperial players in the game on Ilum.
